topics.title: Pipeline Review and Application
topics.content:
- There was a discussion about the pipeline review, mentioning collaboration with PMS and NPO.
- The development status of POC (Proof of Concept) was discussed, and challenges related to an app for uploading IP were pointed out.
- A discussion related to EBM (Evidence-Based Medicine) emphasized the importance of data utilization.
- There were mentions of biomarkers and GMP, with discussions on quality control in research and development.
- Information was shared about pipeline training members.

subTopics.subTitle: Team Introductions
subTopics.content:
- John introduced himself as the project manager
- Sarah is the lead developer
- Michael joined as UX designer

subTopics.subTitle: Project Timeline Overview
subTopics.content:
- Six-month development cycle proposed
- Beta release scheduled for month 4
- Final delivery expected by December

topics.title: Budget Discussion
topics.content:
- Total budget approved at $250,000
- Hardware purchases need separate approval
- Monthly spending reports required
